paper_abstract: We propose a Bayesian procedure to sample from the distribution of the multi-dimensional effective dose. This effective dose is the set of dose levels of multiple predictive factors that produce a binary response with a fixed probability. We apply our algorithms to parametric and semiparametric logistics regression models, respectively. The graphical display of random samples obtained through Markov chain Monte Carlo can provide some insight into the predictive distribution.
paper_title: On the multivariate predictive distribution of multi-dimensional effective dose: a Bayesian approach
